title: Milestone 1: Task 1 - Set up Angular project
body:
Initialize an Angular project with routing and SCSS.

Checklist:
- Install Angular CLI.
- Generate a new Angular project (`ng new coding-challenges-platform --routing --style=scss`).
- Configure the workspace and install dependencies.

title: Milestone 1: Task 2 - Install and configure PrimeNG
body:
Add PrimeNG to the project for UI components.

Checklist:
- Install PrimeNG and PrimeIcons: `npm install primeng primeicons`.
- Configure `angular.json` to include PrimeNG CSS files.
- Verify installation by adding a sample PrimeNG component.

title: Milestone 1: Task 3 - Set up Firebase for authentication
body:
Configure Firebase for login and authentication.

Checklist:
- Create a Firebase project.
- Add AngularFire to the Angular project: `ng add @angular/fire`.
- Configure Firebase Authentication and environment files.

title: Milestone 1: Task 4 - Set up FastAPI backend
body:
Initialize the backend for the project using FastAPI.

Checklist:
- Create a Python virtual environment.
- Install FastAPI and Uvicorn: `pip install fastapi uvicorn`.
- Create a basic "Hello, World!" endpoint to test the setup.

title: Milestone 1: Task 5 - Create PostgreSQL database schema
body:
Design and set up the database schema for challenges and submissions.

Checklist:
- Define tables for users, challenges, and submissions.
- Create database migration scripts (e.g., using Alembic).

title: Milestone 2: Task 6 - Create the home page
body:
Design the home page to display a list of coding challenges.

Checklist:
- Fetch challenge data from the backend (use mock data initially).
- Use PrimeNG components (e.g., Card or DataTable) to display challenges.
- Add a "Start Challenge" button for each challenge.

title: Milestone 2: Task 7 - Build the challenge page
body:
Design the challenge page for solving coding challenges.

Checklist:
- Add a PrimeNG TabView for challenge description and code editor.
- Integrate Monaco Editor for the code editor.
- Add a "Submit" button for submitting solutions.

title: Milestone 2: Task 8 - Design the dashboard
body:
Create a user dashboard to show completed challenges and progress.

Checklist:
- Use PrimeNG components like DataTable or Accordion for user statistics.
- Fetch user data from the backend.

title: Milestone 2: Task 9 - Set up Firebase Authentication UI
body:
Add login and signup pages with Firebase Authentication.

Checklist:
- Create a login form using PrimeNG InputText and Button components.
- Use AngularFire to connect the form to Firebase Authentication.
- Add error handling and feedback for login/signup failures.

title: Milestone 2: Task 10 - Add routing and navigation
body:
Implement routing and a navigation bar.

Checklist:
- Configure Angular Router for Home, Dashboard, and Challenge pages.
- Create a PrimeNG Menubar for navigation.

title: Milestone 3: Task 11 - Create API for fetching challenges
body:
Develop an API endpoint to fetch coding challenges.

Checklist:
- Create a `/challenges` endpoint in FastAPI.
- Fetch challenges from the database.
- Add pagination support.

title: Milestone 3: Task 12 - Create API for submitting solutions
body:
Develop an API endpoint to evaluate submitted code.

Checklist:
- Create a `/submit` endpoint in FastAPI.
- Validate user submissions and test against predefined cases.
- Return results as JSON.

title: Milestone 3: Task 13 - Integrate code execution engine
body:
Connect the backend to a code execution engine like Judge0 or Piston.

Checklist:
- Create a service to send code to the execution engine.
- Fetch and return results from the engine.

title: Milestone 3: Task 14 - Connect OpenAI API for challenge generation
body:
Use OpenAI API to generate coding challenges.

Checklist:
- Create a `/generate-challenge` endpoint.
- Send prompts to OpenAI and parse the results.
- Store generated challenges in the database.

title: Milestone 3: Task 15 - Set up database interaction
body:
Write functions to query the PostgreSQL database.

Checklist:
- Use SQLAlchemy or similar library for database operations.
- Implement CRUD operations for challenges and submissions.

title: Milestone 4: Task 16 - Integrate frontend with backend APIs
body:
Connect Angular components to backend endpoints.

Checklist:
- Fetch challenges on the home page.
- Send code submissions from the challenge page to the backend.

title: Milestone 4: Task 17 - Add real-time feedback for submissions
body:
Implement real-time updates for code execution results.

Checklist:
- Use WebSocket with Socket.IO for real-time updates.
- Display submission results on the challenge page dynamically.

title: Milestone 5: Task 18 - Deploy frontend to Firebase Hosting
body:
Host the Angular app on Firebase.

Checklist:
- Build the app for production: `ng build --prod`.
- Deploy to Firebase Hosting.

title: Milestone 5: Task 19 - Deploy backend to Render
body:
Host the FastAPI backend on a free Render tier.

Checklist:
- Containerize the app using Docker.
- Deploy the app and test the API endpoints.

title: Milestone 6: Task 20 - Test the entire workflow
body:
Perform end-to-end testing for all features.

Checklist:
- Test login → start challenge → submit code → view results.
- Fix bugs and handle edge cases.

title: Milestone 6: Task 21 - Optimize performance
body:
Improve app performance for better user experience.

Checklist:
- Optimize backend queries.
- Use lazy loading for Angular routes.
